Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness. Mr. David Cameron said Friday that he was "very sorry" that Mr. Andy Coulson had resigned from his government post.
